public.users_used_storage.name: users_used_storage
public.users_used_storage.definition: SELECT (storage.foldername(objects.name))[1] AS user_id, COALESCE(sum((objects.metadata ->> 'size'::text)::bigint), 0::numeric) AS total_size FROM storage.objects WHERE objects.bucket_id = 'assets'::text GROUP BY ((storage.foldername(objects.name))[1])
